segments.advisor_message: So, uh, let’s talk about your dependents. Can you tell me, like, who they are and what their names are?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I've got one, um, my son, his name is Liam, he just turned five last month. I think I, uh, I should probably give you his date of birth too, right?

segments.advisor_message: Right, right! And when is he considered a dependent until? Do you know that?
segments.client_message: Uh, I think he’ll be a dependent until, like, he’s 18 or something? So, uh, that would be, let me see... um, 2027?
